project_abstract.cdata: The Power Distribution Program Project consists of a three-year portion of the Project Companies' five-year expansion programs comprising the rehabilitation and expansion of their transmission and distribution systems. About 20 to 25 percent of the total expenditures will be for rehabilitation. Facilities to be installed include high-voltage connecting lines and related substations, low-voltage distribution feeders and transformers and related distribution hardware such as switchgear, meters, etc.
